resources.string: Access to write external storage is needed for database access.
This application cannot run because it does not have permission to write external storage. Please allow these permissions through app settings. The application will now exit.
Access to set alarms is needed for setting incident reminders.
This application cannot run because it does not have permission to set alarms. Please allow these permissions through app settings. The application will now exit.
Vibration permissions are needed for setting reminders.
This application cannot run because it does not have vibration permissions. Please allow these permissions through app settings. The application will now exit.
